name: Sam Carter
description: Sam Carteris a6th Streetganger inCyberpunk 2077. His appearance is exclusive to theStreetkidLifepath. WhilePadreis givingVa ride, Sam Carter, accompanied by other6th Streetgangers, appears and threatens the fixer at gunpoint to tell theValentinosto abandonVista del Rey. Padre or V warn him to leave. While the 6th Streeter complies, he threatens Padre again, stating their business isn't done.Sam was eventually captured by the Valentinos and executed by Padre himself.
